headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LADKA, WENDY JUNE

snippet: LADKA--Wendy June, May 30, 1954 - July 3, 2016 She had been a resident of Long Beach, NY. She leaves behind her mother, Dorothy Ladka, nephew Christopher Ladka and brother, Kerry Ladka as well as her partner, Patrick Dunworth. Words cannot express...
lead_paragraph: LADKA--Wendy June, May 30, 1954 - July 3, 2016 She had been a resident of Long Beach, NY. She leaves behind her mother, Dorothy Ladka, nephew Christopher Ladka and brother, Kerry Ladka as well as her partner, Patrick Dunworth. Words cannot express the depth of our sorrow. 1/3
